## Overall Project Reflection

In this final journal entry, reflect on your entire research project experience.
In doing so, please consider the following questions:

### What did you learn?

- What technical skills did you develop?
- What research methods did you learn?
- What did you learn about yourself as a researcher?

### What challenges did you face?

- What were the biggest obstacles you encountered?
- How did you overcome these obstacles?
- What would you do differently if you could start over?

### What are you most proud of?

- What accomplishments stand out?
- What aspects of your work exceeded your expectations?
- What contributions did your research make?

### What are your next steps?

- How will you build on this research in the future?
- What questions remain unanswered?
- How might you apply what you learned to future projects?

Use this entry to synthesize your experiences and articulate the value of the
work you have completed throughout the semester.
